cz.cvut.fel.pjv.simulation

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.pjv.simulation.Simulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Simulation with a map. There are fox and hare on the map interacting with each other. Fox eat hare and die of old age. They mate. As well as hare do.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Connect to server on given address and port
        Parameters:

        port - e.g. 8888
        Returns:

      • getBlock

        public Block getBlock(int coordX,
                      int coordY)
        checks if block is on local map, if not, checks if network connection is running. If it is, it asks server for the block
        Parameters:
        coordX - is x coordinate of the block
        coordY - is y coordinate of the block
        Returns:
        the block

      • isOnMyMap

        public boolean isOnMyMap(int x,
                         int y)
        checks based on x and y coordinates wheter something (block) is on the local map
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        Returns:
        true if it is, false otherwise

      • findFreeBlockForMating

        public Block findFreeBlockForMating(Animal a1,
                                    Animal a2)
        checks surrounding blocks of both animals
        Parameters:
        a1 - animal1
        a2 - animal2
        Returns:
        surrounding blocks for both animals

      • deleteAnimalAtBlock

        public boolean deleteAnimalAtBlock(Block block)
        checks if block is local. if yes, deletes it locally and return true. if not, checks if network connection is up. If it is, it asks server to delete animal at given block and waits for response.
        Parameters:
        block - to delete animal on
        Returns:
        true if deletion was successful, false otherwise

      • serverAsksToSetBlock

        public boolean serverAsksToSetBlock(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    Block newBlock)
        this method gets called when request comes from server to set block on local map.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of block
        y - coordinate of block
        newBlock - is the block to set on x and y coordinates
        Returns:
        true if request is assessed positively. false otherwise
